name: The Dark Lab
description:
"THE DARK LAB" is a short sci-fi / horror fiction action game, inspired by @thetrung 's pixel art / concept, that only came to life when @ComeAtMeBoi caught up with him to develop together.

:: INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS ::

WINDOWS VERSION 
Double click the installer and follow the steps.

IMPORTANT
The windows installer might be blocked by your antivirus or windows because of a false positive. I've been told before that it gets detected as a virus but trust me,it's not.You can execute it safely.

MAC OS X VERSION 
Unzip and execute the game. If you have trouble executing the application then do the following :

1) Reach at the same folder at which your application exists.

2) Within the terminal program,execute this link of code :

chmod a+x The Dark Lab.app/Contents/MacOS/*

Please enjoy and tell us what you think !

DEVELOPMENT TEAM

  • Coder : ComeAtMeBoi
  • Artist : thetrung
